title: CLARITY Data Package Schema Specification
description: CLARITY Data Package is a simple specification for data access and delivery.

version.title: Version
version.description: A unique version number for this descriptor.
version.context: It should conform to the Semantic Versioning requirements (http://semver.org/) and should follow the Data Package Version pattern (https://frictionlessdata.io/specs/patterns/#data-package-version): MAJOR.MINOR.PATCH (e.g., 1.0.0)

created.title: Created
created.description: The datetime on which this descriptor was created.

image.title: Image
image.description: A image to represent a data package.

keywords.title: Keywords
keywords.description: A list of keywords that describe this package.

price.title: Price
price.description: The monetary cost at which the data package is offered (in EURO if not indicated otherwise).

amount.title: Amount
amount.description: The price of the data package. If the data package is free, then the value of this parameter MUST be 0.0

currency.title: Currency
currency.description:
The currency property of a price is given. 

It MUST be one of the codes listed here: https://www.currency-iso.org/en/home/tables/table-a1.html. By default, the currency code is "EUR"

css_style.title: CSS Style
css_style.description:
The css_style property is a pointer to a default CSS file containing the styling configuration for several elements within the data package (e.g., threholds values colouring, vector and raster maps colouring, etc.).

Please, check the following links for further information:
# https://www.w3.org/TR/css-2018/ 
# https://docs.geoserver.org/latest/en/user/styling/css/cookbook/index.html
